title: The Royal river
creator_credit: Rayant Pictures and Kenneth J. Fairbairn
brief_description: A journey down the River Thames showing many places of interest: Oxford, Henley Regatta, Windsor Castle (including the interior of historic St Georges Chapel) and Runnymede, the Tower of London showing the Crown Jewels and the Ceremony of the Keys.
description: A journey down the River Thames showing many places of interest: Oxford, Henley Regatta, Windsor Castle (including the interior of historic St Georges Chapel) and Runnymede, the Tower of London showing the Crown Jewels and the Ceremony of the Keys.
